channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 15:38 Alarm lifted in Sumy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 15:38 Alarm lifted in Sumy region. Follow further messages. #Sumy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 15:37 Repulse of the alarm in the Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyanskyi district- Kharkivskyi district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 🟡 15:37 Repulse of the alarm in the Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyanskyi district- Kharkivskyi district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Харкивська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 15:19 The threat of artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community has been eliminated. Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 🟡 15:19 The threat of artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community has been eliminated. Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 15:11 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!

item.title: 🟠 14:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
